Class AbstractGenerate

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractGenerate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Generate

    public abstract class AbstractGenerate
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Generate methods for 312 exercise. This class provides an interface for arbitrary code generators to accept syntax from the rest of the system. This class has been provided to students

        public Variable getVariable(java.lang.String identifier)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
